name: Myth
description: Featuring the limited-edition NFTs based on mythical God characters, such as Zeus, Athena, and Hades, illustrated by celebrity artist Pat Lee, God Temple allows players to play as the mythical characters against others through its global matching system. It will be a Play-to-Earn model utilizing both the platformâ€™s native token (MYTH) and the game token (SOUL), which are necessary for players to start a game. The winner in the duel will receive a game token (SOUL) as a prize, which will be tradable on secondary markets.
